root.name: Hitogata Happa
root.description: OverviewVertical shooter in the Gundemonium series, where you have to fight your way through numerous enemies. In this game you use bewitched dolls that can wield weapons of mass destruction to blast the invaders to pieces. Fight your way through six levels choosing from twelve playable characters.PC System RequirementsOperating system: Windows速 XP, Vista, or Windows 7Processor: Intel速 1 GHz Processor (Recommended: 2 GHz)Memory: 256 MB RAM (Recommended: 512 MB RAM)Hard disk space: 500MBVideo: DirectX速 9 level Graphics CardSound: DirectSound-compatible Sound CardDirectX速: DirectX 9 or above
